lead_paragraph: Buffalo Bills running back Marshawn Lynch is expected to plead guilty next week to an unspecified charge stemming from a hit-and-run accident involving his S.U.V., Erie County District Attorney Frank Clark said.
snippet: Buffalo Bills running back Marshawn Lynch is expected to plead guilty next week to an unspecified charge stemming from a hit-and-run accident involving his S.U.V., Erie County District Attorney Frank Clark said.
